ARCHITECTURE/AUTHENTICATION.title: Authentication System
ARCHITECTURE/AUTHENTICATION.description: The Blankspace authentication system combines Privy for wallet-based authentication with Farcaster for social identity, creating a seamless Web3 social experience.

ARCHITECTURE/OVERVIEW.title: Architecture Overview
ARCHITECTURE/OVERVIEW.description: Blankspace is built on a modern, modular architecture that combines Next.js App Router with Zustand state management, creating a highly customizable Farcaster client experience.

ARCHITECTURE/STATE_MANAGEMENT.title: State Management Architecture
ARCHITECTURE/STATE_MANAGEMENT.description: Blankspace uses a sophisticated Zustand-based state management system with store composition, persistence, and optimistic updates.

CONTRIBUTING.title: Contributing
CONTRIBUTING.description: To add any code to the blankdotspace/space-system repo, you will need to open a PR.

DEVELOPMENT/CODING_STANDARDS.title: Coding Standards
DEVELOPMENT/CODING_STANDARDS.description: This document outlines the coding standards and best practices for the Nounspace codebase to ensure consistency, maintainability, and code quality.

DEVELOPMENT/COMPONENT_ARCHITECTURE.title: Component Architecture
DEVELOPMENT/COMPONENT_ARCHITECTURE.description: Blankspace follows atomic design principles with a modular component architecture that promotes reusability, maintainability, and scalability.

DEVELOPMENT/DEBUGGING.title: Debugging Guide
DEVELOPMENT/DEBUGGING.description: This guide covers debugging strategies, tools, and techniques for the Blankspace codebase to help developers identify and resolve issues effectively.

DEVELOPMENT/TESTING.title: Testing Guide
DEVELOPMENT/TESTING.description: This guide covers testing strategies, patterns, and best practices for the Blankspace codebase to ensure code quality and reliability.

DOCUMENTATION_OVERVIEW.title: Documentation Overview
DOCUMENTATION_OVERVIEW.description: This document provides an overview of the Blankspace documentation structure and organization.

GETTING_STARTED.title: Getting Started
GETTING_STARTED.description: This guide walks you through setting up Blankspace for local development, including database setup and seeding.

INTEGRATIONS/FARCASTER.title: Farcaster Integration
INTEGRATIONS/FARCASTER.description: Blankspace integrates deeply with the Farcaster protocol to provide social features and identity management.

INTEGRATIONS/SUPABASE.title: Supabase Integration
INTEGRATIONS/SUPABASE.description: Blankspace uses Supabase for database management, authentication, and file storage, providing a scalable backend infrastructure.

PROJECT_STRUCTURE.title: Project Structure
PROJECT_STRUCTURE.description: This document describes the directory layout and organization of the Blankspace codebase.

README.title: Blankspace Documentation
README.description: Blankspace is a platform where communities build their home on Farcaster.

SYSTEMS/DISCOVERY/MINI_APP_DISCOVERY_SYS.title: Neynar Mini Apps Integration
SYSTEMS/DISCOVERY/MINI_APP_DISCOVERY_SYS.description: A streamlined Mini App integration that leverages the official Neynar Mini Apps Catalog API for high-quality, curated Farcaster Frame and Mini App discovery.

SYSTEMS/FIDGETS/DATA_FIELD_PATTERNS.title: Fidget Data Field Patterns
SYSTEMS/FIDGETS/DATA_FIELD_PATTERNS.description: This document outlines essential patterns for fidgets that use the data field in FidgetConfig to store runtime state and cached data. These patterns are derived from the Directory fidget implementation and should be considered best practices.

SYSTEMS/FIDGETS/FIDGET_PICKER.title: Fidget Picker System
SYSTEMS/FIDGETS/FIDGET_PICKER.description: The fidget picker is the user interface that allows users to browse, search, and add fidgets to their spaces. The system provides two picker components: a simple inline picker and an advanced modal picker with enhanced discovery features.

SYSTEMS/FIDGETS/OVERVIEW.title: Fidgets
SYSTEMS/FIDGETS/OVERVIEW.description: Fidgets are the tools that power community spaces. They're modular widgets that communities can add to their spaces for governance, token management, social feeds, and more.

SYSTEMS/SPACES/OVERVIEW.title: Spaces
SYSTEMS/SPACES/OVERVIEW.description: Spaces are the pages that make up a community's presence on Blankspace. Each community can have multiple types of spaces - for their token, their members, their channel, and custom pages.

SYSTEMS/SPACES/PUBLIC_SPACES_PATTERN.title: Public Spaces Pattern
SYSTEMS/SPACES/PUBLIC_SPACES_PATTERN.description: This document describes the architectural pattern used for public spaces in Nounspace, including how different space types are structured and how common functionality is shared.

SYSTEMS/THEMES/OVERVIEW.title: Theme System Overview
SYSTEMS/THEMES/OVERVIEW.description: The theme system in Blankspace provides comprehensive visual customization capabilities, allowing users to personalize their spaces with custom colors, fonts, layouts, and interactive elements.
